title: Video Shows Officer Pointing Gun At Unarmed Teens
teaser: The McKinney, Texas, police officer has been placed on leave. The video also shows him pushing a 14-year-old girl to the ground.
contentencoded:
In McKinney, Texas, a suburb of Dallas, a police officer has been placed on leave after a video was posted online apparently showing him pushing a 14-year-old girl in a swimsuit to the ground and pointing his gun at other teenagers.

David Thomas, a professor at Florida Gulf Coast University and senior research fellow at the Police Foundation, which works with law enforcement agencies across the country, discusses this case with Here & Now’s Robin Young.

Guest

  • David Thomas, professor at Florida Gulf Coast University and senior research fellow at the Police Foundation.
